snippet: Investigators said they had received no indication that the escaped killers had left the area around the Clinton Correctional Facility in northern New York State.
abstract: Joyce E Mitchell, prison employee charged with aiding escape of two prisoners from Clinton Correction Facility, admits to backing out of plot that involved murdering her husband and serving as getaway driver; investigators disclose that they have no evidence that Richard W Matt and David Sweat have been able to leave immediate area of Dannemora, NY, despite fact that search has widened.

byline.contributor: Vivian Yee contributed reporting from Dannemora, and Michael Winerip from Plattsburgh.

lead_paragraph: Investigators said they had received no indication that the escaped killers had left the area around the Clinton Correctional Facility in northern New York State.

headline.main: Prison Worker Charged in 2 Convicts’ Escape Is Linked to a Murder Plot
headline.print_headline: Prison Worker Charged in 2 Convicts’ Escape Is Linked to a Murder Plot
